## Checklist
> Remove all that cannot be applied in PR type
### General
- [ ] Code follows project coding standards
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] New tests added or existing tests updated
- [ ] No breaking changes (or documented)
- [ ] Documentation updated where needed

### Feature Additions
- [ ] Meets acceptance criteria
- [ ] UX/UI reviewed (if applicable)

### Bug Fixes
- [ ] Root cause documented
- [ ] Regression tests added

### Documentation Updates
- [ ] Spelling/grammar validated
- [ ] All links checked
- [ ] Documentation accurately reflects system state

### CI/CD Changes
- [ ] Pipelines validated successfully
- [ ] Rollout/rollback plan provided (if applicable)

Add any extra information that may help reviewers.
